isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, DT-466E, I-530E AND T-444E - OPERATION - Barometric Air Pressure (BAP) Sensor

svcproc.title: Barometric Air Pressure (BAP) Sensor
svcproc.para: The ECM (379) sends a regulated 5 volt signal from ECM (379) by circuit 97U, bulkhead connector (3), circuit 97U to a splice, and circuit 97BL to BARO sensor (406). The BAP sensor (406) returns a variable voltage signal (represents atmospheric pressure) on circuit 97CD, connector (3) and circuit 97CD to the ECM (379). The BAP sensor (406) is grounded by circuit 97Z/97W, connector (3), circuit 97W/97WB to the ECM (379) signal ground.
